subject: Re: [PATCH] nfsd: report the requested maximum number of threads instead of number running

reviews.author: Chuck Lever
reviews.summary: Reviewer Chuck Lever pointed out that the documentation should be updated to reflect the change in behavior, specifically mentioning three places where it needs to be corrected.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jeff Layton suggested minor changes for the next version of the patch and clarified how the patch affects the reporting of thread counts in /proc and via netlink.

reviews.author: Mike Owen
reviews.summary: Reviewer Mike Owen expressed concern about how users would retrieve the current thread count after dynamic threading patches and suggested adding information to the man page.
